entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS AROUND 50

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
